headline: Why EPAM (EPAM) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of digital engineering services company EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) jumped 4.8% in the morning session after investment firm TD Cowen upgraded its rating on the stock to Buy from Hold.
